content.title: Artificial Intelligence – Computer Engineering Capstone Project
description: Led a 5-member project team while owning the AI component, developing and deploying a neural network on FPGA for real-time gesture recognition; improved model accuracy through hyperparameter tuning, feature engineering, and data augmentation (10× expansion), achieving reliable classification and reducing false predictions.

Directed external communications, implementing secure TCP/IP and MQTT protocols with AES encryption, concurrency handling, and error-checking mechanisms; built and tested 1- and 2-player functional systems with features such as round counters and packet validation, enabling seamless integration across subsystems.

content.title: Blockchain – ETHGlobal Bangkok & ETHGlobal Singapore
description: Won 3rd place among 309 projects in Worldcoin's Best Use of World ID track at ETHGlobal Singapore by developing ZkScholar, a decentralized app for private financial aid applications using zk-SNARKs, collaborating in a team of three.

Secured runner-up in the Real-World Impact: Best Social Good Application track at ETHGlobal Bangkok (2,750+ developers) with DocuEarn, a privacy-focused dApp enabling passive income from health data using ZK proofs.

content.title: Quantitative Finance – QuantEdge Summer Insights Program
description: Learned financial management, investment strategies, and asset allocation from senior management and analysts, and extended externship to complete a technical project in portfolio management.

content.title: Telegram Bot - Study Buddy
description: Led the development and deployment of a Telegram Bot for student study groups using Python and MongoDB on Heroku, reaching 80 Engineering students with 29 active users in a pilot program.
